body.p:
To create a DITA OT Transformation scenario:
Click the Configure Transformation Scenario(s)() button on the Transformation toolbar. The Configure Transformation Scenario(s) dialog is displayed.
Click the New button and select DITA OT Transformation. The DITA Transformation Type dialog is displayed. This dialog presents the list of possible outputs that the DITA OT Transformation is able to produce. Select DITA Transformation type
Select DITA Transformation type
Select the desired transformation type and click OK. The New Scenario dialog is displayed.
Configure the options that control the transformation in the New Scenario dialog.

The lower part of the dialog box contains the following tabs (only those that are appropriate for the chosen output type will be displayed):
Skins (Available for the WebHelp and WebHelp with Feedback DITA transformation scenarios).
FO Processor.
Parameters.
Filters.
Advanced.
Output.

p.note: To display the console during the transformation process, click Show console output in the status bar.
